requests.curl:
curl "http://smart-life.com//admin/interface_documents?page=1&per_page=15" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "X-Admin-Token: qwertyuiop1" \
	-H "X-Admin-Email: admin@example.com" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
